title: Owen Hargreaves names one positive for Man Utd from their defeat to Newcastle
text:
Owen Hargreaves says Manchester United’s players look short of confidence (Optus Sport)

Owen Hargreaves claims the only positive Ole Gunnar Solskjaer can take from Manchester United’s defeat to Newcastle United is the performance of Axel Tuanzebe.

United sunk to a 1-0 defeat at St James’ Park on Sunday following Matty Longstaff’s goal in the second half.

The loss has left United with just nine points from eight Premier League games this season, while Solskjaer now admits his side could struggle to secure a place in the top six.

Tuanzebe, meanwhile, partnered Harry Maguire in central defence due to Victor Lindelof’s absence and Hargreaves was impressed with the 21-year-old’s display.

‘Think about the start of the game,’ Hargreaves told Optus Sport.

‘One position Juan Mata has never played at Manchester United on the left wing – he starts on the left wing.

Juan Mata struggled to make an impact at St James’ Park (AMA/Getty Images)

‘Everybody moans that he plays on the right, then he plays on the left for some reason.

‘[Andreas] Perreira is a No.10, he plays on the right.

‘Rashford is struggling for confidence, we’re not sure if he’s a No.9.

‘Fred, I feel sorry for him because he’s struggling in a United shirt.

Axel Tuanzebe impressed Hargreaves with his performance against Newcastle (Getty Images)

‘You’ve got so many people in positions which aren’t even their own… Ashley Young was playing left-back.

‘The only bright spark I’d say today was Tuanzebe. I thought he played really well.

‘But the rest is so far off what you’d expect. I feel sorry for United fans because this will take a long time to fix.’
